article: Sudha Chandran was a dancer from India.She lost her chance to be a  _  when her right leg had to be cut off after a car accident. Though the  _  brought her bright career to a stop,she didn't  give up  .In the terrible months that followed,she met a doctor  _  had developed an artificial limb . After she was fitted with an artificial leg,she decided to go back to  _  . Sudha believed that she could  _  her dream come true.Then she did  a lot  for her dream. After every public show,she would ask her dad about her act."You  _  have a long way to go."was the answer she used to get  _  her father. In January 2004.Sudha made an important return by  _  .She gave a show in such an amazing manner  _  it moved everyone to tears.In the end,she  _  the final prize of the show. That evening,when she asked her dad the  _  question,he didn't say  _  .He just touched her feet as praise to a great artist. When someone asked Sudha  _  she could dance again with her artificial limb,she said quite simply."I don't need feet to dance."
